content: porch goose ear flap hat by liz williams ~15 yards of worsted weight yarn i used 12 yds of red heart super saver ombre us 8 5 0mm needles pompom i made one using 4 yds of red heart super saver abbreviations k knit k2tog knit 2 together m1r make 1 right m1l make 1 left ssk slip slip knit row 1 cast on 4 stitches leave 8 -10 tail for chin strap row 2 knit all row 3 k1 m1r k2 m1l k1 6 row 4-8 knit all row 9 k1 m1r k4 m1l k1 8 row 10 knit all row 11 k1 m1r k to end 9 row 12 knit all row 13-16 repeat row 11 & 12 twice 11 row 17 k1 m1r k until 1 stitch remaining m1l k1 13 row 18 knit all row 19-20 repeat row 17 & 18 15 row 21-24 knit all row 25 k1 ssk k until 1 stitch remaining k2tog k1 13 row 26 knit all row 27-28 repeat row 25 & 26 11 row 29 k1 ssk k to end 10 row 30 knit all row 31-34 repeat row 29 & 30 twice 8 row 35 k1 ssk k2 k2tog k1 6 row 36-40 knit all row 41 k1 ssk k2tog k1 4 row 42 knit all row 43 bind o leave 8 -10 tail for chin strap i strung another piece of yarn ~20 through the end of each flap to leave 3 strings on each flap then braided add pom-pom to top
